## popTile() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Create a function that removes a tile from a board.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function popTile(coordinate: HexCoordinate): (board: GameBoard) => GameBoard;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

coordinate


</td><td>

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)


</td><td>

The coordinate from which the tile will be removed.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

(board: [GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; [GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)

A function that takes a game board as a parameter; when called, the function will remove the tile at `coordinate` from the board. The function will throw [NoTileAtCoordinateError](./hive-lib.notileatcoordinateerror.md) if there is no tile at `coordinate`<!-- -->.
